ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on evenly all around
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.5_0: 1. The training rule on evenly all around
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.6_0: Venerables, these rules to be trained in come up for recitation.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six wore their sarongs hanging down in front and behind.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.4_0: “How can the Sakyan ascetics wear their sarongs hanging down in front and behind? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.5_0: The monks heard those people complaining,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.6_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.7_0: “How can the monks from the group of six wear their sarongs hanging down in front and behind?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.8_0: After criticizing those monks in many ways, they told the Buddha.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.9_0: The Buddha convened the Sangha of monks and questioned those monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.10_0: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.13_0: “... Foolish men, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.14_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.15_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.16.1_0: “‘I will train in the round,’ this is how you should train.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.17_0: One should wear one’s sarong evenly all around, covering the navel and the knees.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.18_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, wears his sarong hanging down in front or behind, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.24_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.27_0: The first rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
